Header: Corps of Sri Lanka Engineers Marks Corps Day with Blood Donation
Content: A blood donation arrangement was organized by the Corps of Sri Lanka Engineers to coincide with the 67th Corps Day commemoration. Major General Darshana Hettiarrachchi, Colonel Commandant attended the Corps Day at the Corps Headquarters in Panagoda on Tuesday (23). On the request made by the Corps of Engineers, medical staff at the National Cancer Hospital, Maharagama extended their support to make this event a success. More than 200 donors, including Officers and Other Ranks gave away blood on this special occasion.
